title: Are Pharmaceutical Companies Hiding the Presence of Peanut Oil in Vaccines?
subtitle: Despite arguments that vaccines are to blame for rising peanut allergies, the claim that peanut oil is present in inoculations rests almost entirely on a misreading of newspaper articles from the 1960s.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Peanut oil is secretly present in childhood vaccines and flu shots.
